org.apache.reef.io.data.loading.api

Interface DataLoadingService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InputFormatLoadingService

    public interface DataLoadingService
    All data loading services should implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getComputeContextIdPrefix() 
      Configuration getContextConfiguration(AllocatedEvaluator allocatedEvaluator) 
      int getNumberOfPartitions()
      Access to the number of partitions suggested by this DataSource.
      Configuration getServiceConfiguration(AllocatedEvaluator allocatedEvaluator)

      Distinguishes data loaded contexts from compute contexts.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfPartitions

        int getNumberOfPartitions()
        Access to the number of partitions suggested by this DataSource.
        Returns:
        the number of partitions suggested by this DataSource.

      • getContextConfiguration

        Configuration getContextConfiguration(AllocatedEvaluator allocatedEvaluator)
        Returns:
        the context configuration for the given Evaluator.

      • getServiceConfiguration

        Configuration getServiceConfiguration(AllocatedEvaluator allocatedEvaluator)
        Returns:
        the service configuration for the given Evaluator.

      • getComputeContextIdPrefix

        String getComputeContextIdPrefix()
        Returns:
        Return the prefix to be used to enumerate context ids for compute requests fired other than the data load contexts.

      • isDataLoadedContext

        boolean isDataLoadedContext(ActiveContext context)
        Distinguishes data loaded contexts from compute contexts.
        Returns:
        true if this context has been loaded with data.

      • isComputeContext

        boolean isComputeContext(ActiveContext context)
        Returns:
        true if this is a computation context, false otherwise. (e.g. this is a data loading context).
